text: Wallace Fenwick Knock (November 23, 1913 – February 11, 1988) was a Canadian curler. He was the lead on the 1951 Brier Champion team, skipped by Don Oyler. ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1913 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Curlers from Nova Scotia Category:People from Lunenburg County, Nova Scotia Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Wally Knock
